alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 12:44PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lander and northwestern Nye Counties through 115 PM PDT... At 1243 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles west of Kingston, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reese River Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
